## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablelist">ImmutableList</a> - This class represents an immutable (functional) list.

It is implemented as a smart pointer (wraps <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablelistimpl">ImmutableListImpl</a>), so it it is intended to always be copied by value as if it were a pointer. This interface matches <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutableset">ImmutableSet</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablemap">ImmutableMap</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablelist">ImmutableList</a> objects should almost never be created directly, and instead should be created by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablelistfactory">ImmutableListFactory</a> objects that manage the lifetime of a group of lists. When the factory object is reclaimed, all lists created by that factory are released as well.

Definition at line 65 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/immutablelist-h">ImmutableList.h</a>.

### isEqual() {#aea2ac1ffa2bb0fc519b1e65a21be161f}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::ImmutableList&lt; T &gt;::isEqual (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablelist">ImmutableList</a> &amp; L) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
isEqual - Returns true if two lists are equal.

Because all lists created from the same <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablelistfactory">ImmutableListFactory</a> are uniqued, this has O(1) complexity because it the contents of the list do not need to be compared. Note that you should only compare two lists created from the same <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablelistfactory">ImmutableListFactory</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/immutablelist-h/#l00128">128</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/immutablelist-h">ImmutableList.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
